${ModID}:Bunker.NAME: Bunker
${ModID}:Bunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade adjacent cards.

${ModID}:CrossCut.NAME: Cross Cut
${ModID}:CrossCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

${ModID}:DoubleBladed.NAME: Double Bladed
${ModID}:DoubleBladed.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack. NL Add !M! {@@}{!M!|1=copy|@=copies} of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EchoingHymn.NAME: Echoing Hymn
${ModID}:EchoingHymn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Gambler.NAME: Gambler
${ModID}:Gambler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack enters your hand, increase its damage by 0 to !M! this combat.

${ModID}:GravityHammer.NAME: Gravity Hammer
${ModID}:GravityHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal equal damage to adjacent enemies. NL Ignores Block.

${ModID}:PenaltyOfDeath.NAME: Penalty of Death
${ModID}:PenaltyOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Die next turn.

${ModID}:PowerShot.NAME: Power Shot
${ModID}:PowerShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if adjacent to a Power.

${ModID}:Tribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:Tribute.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. If you do, add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Tribute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. If you do, add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand.

${ModID}:Zielregen.NAME: Zielregen
${ModID}:Zielregen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.
